solution_line_template: There were {cookies_left_at_end} + {third_friend_took} = <<{cookies_left_at_end}+{third_friend_took}={cookies_before_third_friend}>>{cookies_before_third_friend} cookies left before the third friend took {third_friend_took}.

There were {cookies_before_third_friend} + {second_friend_took} = <<{cookies_before_third_friend}+{second_friend_took}={cookies_before_second_friend}>>{cookies_before_second_friend} cookies left before the second friend took {second_friend_took}.

There were {cookies_before_second_friend} + {first_friend_took} = <<{cookies_before_second_friend}+{first_friend_took}={cookies_before_first_friend}>>{cookies_before_first_friend} cookies left before the first friend took {first_friend_took}.

There were {cookies_before_first_friend} + {brother_took} = <<{cookies_before_first_friend}+{brother_took}={cookies_before_brother}>>{cookies_before_brother} cookies left before Kristy gave {brother_took} cookie to her brother.
There were {cookies_before_brother} + {kristy_ate} = <<{cookies_before_brother}+{kristy_ate}={total_baked_cookies}>>{total_baked_cookies} cookies that Kristy baked.
